str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) a writing, (b) a passage of scripture; plur: the scriptures. A document, i.e. Holy Writ.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To muzzle, silence. From phimos; to muzzle.
An ox, cow, bull. Probably from the base of bosko; an ox, i.e. An animal of that species.

word: while it is treading out the grain,”
parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To thresh (wheat). From the same as halon; to tread out grain.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A field-laborer; then: a laborer, workman in general. From ergon; a toiler; figuratively, a teacher.
Worthy, worthy of, deserving, comparable, suitable. Probably from ago; deserving, comparable or suitable.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
(a) pay, wages, salary, (b) reward, recompense, punishment. Apparently a primary word; pay for service, good or bad.
